verses.verse: וְשַׁ֣בְתִּֽי <WH7725> So I returned אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> and considered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֲשֻׁקִ֔ים <WH6217> all the oppressions אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נַעֲשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> that are done תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> and behold דִּמְעַ֣ת <WH1832> and behold the tears הָעֲשֻׁקִ֗ים <WH6217> of oppression וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> had לָהֶם֙ מְנַחֵ֔ם <WH5162> and they had no comforter וּמִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> and on the side עֹֽשְׁקֵיהֶם֙ <WH6231> of [such as were] oppressed כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> [there was] power וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no לָהֶ֖ם מְנַחֵֽם׃ <WH5162> but they had no comforter

וְשַׁבֵּ֧חַ <WH7623> Wherefore I praised אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֵּתִ֖ים <WH4191> the dead שֶׁכְּבָ֣ר <WH3528> which are already מֵ֑תוּ <WH4191> dead מִן־ <WH4480> more הַ֣חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> more than the living אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> alive עֲדֶֽנָה׃ <WH5728> which are yet

וְטוֹב֙ <WH2896> Yea better מִשְּׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> [is he] than both אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עֲדֶ֖ן <WH5728> they which hath not yet לֹ֣א <WH3808> has never הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> existed אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has never רָאָה֙ <WH7200> been who hath not seen אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH4639> work הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that is done תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

וְרָאִ֨יתִֽי <WH7200> Again I considered אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עָמָ֗ל <WH5999> all travail וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every כִּשְׁר֣וֹן <WH3788> and every right הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> work כִּ֛י <WH3588> for הִ֥יא <WH1931> he קִנְאַת־ <WH7068> is envied אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> that for this a man מֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> of his neighbour גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> This [is] also vanity וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit
הַכְּסִיל֙ <WH3684> The fool חֹבֵ֣ק <WH2263> together אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֔יו <WH3027> his hands וְאֹכֵ֖ל <WH398> and eateth אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <WH1320> his own flesh

ט֕וֹב <WH2896> Better מְלֹ֥א <WH4393> full כַ֖ף <WH3709> [is] an handful נָ֑חַת <WH5183> [with] quietness מִמְּלֹ֥א <WH4393> full חָפְנַ֛יִם <WH2651> than both the hands עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> [with] travail וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit
וְשַׁ֧בְתִּי <WH7725> Then I returned אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I וָאֶרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> and I saw הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> vanity תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> under the sun

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is אֶחָד֩ <WH259> one וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> without שֵׁנִ֜י <WH8145> [alone] and [there is] not a second גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Indeed בֵּ֧ן <WH1121> yea he hath neither child וָאָ֣ח <WH251> nor brother אֵֽין־ <WH369> having ל֗וֹ וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> nor קֵץ֙ <WH7093> yet [is there] no end לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all עֲמָל֔וֹ <WH5999> of all his labour גַּם־ <WH1571> too [עֵינָיו כ] (עֵינֹ֖ו <WH5869> affliction ק) לֹא־ <WH3808> were not תִשְׂבַּ֣ע <WH7646> satisfied עֹ֑שֶׁר <WH6239> with riches וּלְמִ֣י ׀ <WH4310> whom אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עָמֵ֗ל <WH6001> neither [saith he] For whom do I labour וּמְחַסֵּ֤ר <WH2637> and bereave אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> my soul מִטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> good גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> he הֶ֛בֶל <WH1892> is vanity וְעִנְיַ֥ן <WH6045> travail רָ֖ע <WH7451> yea it [is] a sore הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

טוֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> [are] better הַשְּׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> Two מִן־ <WH4480> than הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> than one אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> because יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> because they have לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like שָׂכָ֥ר <WH7939> reward ט֖וֹב <WH2896> a good בַּעֲמָלָֽם׃ <WH5999> for their labour

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if יִפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> For if they fall הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> the one יָקִ֣ים <WH6965> will lift up אֶת־ <WH853> חֲבֵר֑וֹ <WH2270> his fellow וְאִ֣יל֗וֹ <WH337> but woe הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> to him [that is] alone שֶׁיִּפּ֔וֹל <WH5307> when he falleth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there שֵׁנִ֖י <WH8145> for [he hath] not another לַהֲקִימֽוֹ׃ <WH6965> to help him up

גַּ֛ם <WH1571> Again אִם־ <WH518> if יִשְׁכְּב֥וּ <WH7901> lie together שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> if two וְחַ֣ם <WH2552> then they have heat לָהֶ֑ם וּלְאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> but how can one אֵ֥יךְ <WH349> how יֵחָֽם׃ <WH3179> be warm

וְאִֽם־ <WH518> and if יִתְקְפוֹ֙ <WH8630> prevail הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> And if one הַשְּׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> against him two יַעַמְד֣וּ <WH5975> shall withstand נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> him וְהַחוּט֙ <WH2339> cord הַֽמְשֻׁלָּ֔שׁ <WH8027> him and a threefold לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not בִמְהֵרָ֖ה <WH4120> is not quickly יִנָּתֵֽק׃ <WH5423> broken

ט֛וֹב <WH2896> Better יֶ֥לֶד <WH3206> child מִסְכֵּ֖ן <WH4542> [is] a poor וְחָכָ֑ם <WH2450> and a wise מִמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king זָקֵן֙ <WH2205> than an old וּכְסִ֔יל <WH3684> and foolish אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> who will לְהִזָּהֵ֖ר <WH2094> no more be admonished עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court הָסוּרִ֖ים <WH612> band יָצָ֣א <WH3318> he cometh לִמְלֹ֑ךְ <WH4427> to reign כִּ֛י <WH3588> though גַּ֥ם <WH1571> even בְּמַלְכוּת֖וֹ <WH4438> in his kingdom נוֹלַ֥ד <WH3205> whereas also [he that is] born רָֽשׁ׃ <WH7326> becometh poor

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I considered אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֣חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> all the living הַֽמְהַלְּכִ֖ים <WH1980> which walk תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun עִ֚ם <WH5973> to the side הַיֶּ֣לֶד <WH3206> child הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> with the second אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> that shall stand up תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> under

אֵֽין־ <WH369> There קֵ֣ץ <WH7093> [There is] no end לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of all the people לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> [even] of all that have been before גַּ֥ם <WH1571> and even הָאַחֲרוֹנִ֖ים <WH314> them they also that come after לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> shall not rejoice ב֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גַם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> in him Surely this also [is] vanity וְרַעְי֥וֹן <WH7475> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit
